story.storybody:
London, Jun 1 (PTI) "The Only Way Is Essex" star Jake Hall is reportedly to be in intensive care after an alleged stabbing at a nightclub in the Costa del Sol resort of Puerto Banus.

The 24-year-old was rushed to hospital by friends in the early hours of Monday morning after an attack at the Aqwa Mist nightclub, reported Daily Mirror.

A spokesman for a local emergency services coordination centre has confirmed that police and paramedics were called to a nightspot in Puerto Banus at 3.25am local time on Monday.

A spokesman for Spains National Police also confirmed that officers had been called to an incident at Aqwa Mist.

"Local police were already in attendance when national police officers arrived and they left things to them as there appeared to be no need for them to get involved," the spokesman said.

Halls rep has since confirmed that the TV star is receiving hospital treatment, but did not say wether he was in intensive care and gave no comment on the alleged stabbing. "We can confirm that Jake is currently receiving hospital treatment." PTI NDS NDS
story.shortheadline: Jake Hall hospitalised after alleged stabbing in nightclub
